title: Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes – Complete Edition
body:
Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes – Complete Edition


Genres/Tags: Action, Slasher, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Grasshopper Manufacture, Marvelous Interactive
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 7.7 GB
Repack Size: 5.2 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)
  • Filehosters: DropArk + MegaUp (Uploaded by Vikky793, not compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Travis_Strikes_Again_No_More_Heroes_Complete_Edition-HOODLUM ISO release: hlm-travisstrikesagainnomoreheroescompleteedition.iso (8,225,503,232 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 7.7 to 5.2 GB)
  • Installation takes 4-10 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 8 GB
  • Language can be changed by editing “Engine\Binaries\ThirdParty\Steamworks\Steamv144\Win64\hlm.ini” file
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Travis is living the trailerpark dream in the rural South when Badman comes knocking to avenge his daughter, Bad Girl. It looks like Game Over for Travis when both of them are sucked into the legendary Death Drive Mk II games console. This time, the games are taking the fight to you! The characters of the Death Drive Mk II’s diverse game library aren’t going to go down without a fight! Slice your way through them with all the beam charging, pro-wrestling-finisher action you know and love – turned up to 11. Burn through your skill gauge and link special and regular attacks for some kick-ass combos! Mix-up your approach and own your playstyle. Play as Travis, Badman and – if you’re a bad enough dude – maybe Shinobu and Bad Girl, too!

Travis “Strikes Again” in this Complete Edition for Steam®!

Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes was originally released for the Nintendo Switch in January 2019, with two sets of post-release content, “#1 Black Dandelion” and “#2 Bubblegum Fatale”. Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes Complete Edition for Steam® includes the base game in addition to these pieces of post-release content!
